Title: Mimino
Writer: Revaz Gabriadze, Viktoriya Tokareva, Georgiy Daneliya
Actors: Vakhtang Kikabidze, Mher Mkrtchyan, Elena Proklova, Evgeniy Leonov
Plot: Pilot Mimino works at small local airlines in Georgia, flying helicopters between small villages. He dreams of piloting large international airlines aircrafts, so he goes to Moscow for refresher courses. There in a hotel he meets truck driver Rubik from Armenia who is given a place in that hotel by mistake, and they have a lot of adventures in Moscow.
